rationales.achievement: She extends work hours and tracks student performance systematically to improve results.
rationales.benevolence: She treats individual students' setbacks as personally important and responds with extra support.
rationales.universalism: Her motivation includes breaking broader cycles of disadvantage affecting lower-income students.

rationales.achievement: She evaluates herself against top ranking and remains intensely performance-driven.
She spends additional evening hours creating targeted inference exercises.
rationales.universalism: She explicitly analyzes how testing context privileges some students over others.
rationales.hedonism: She skips dinner while continuing to work, sacrificing immediate wellbeing.

rationales.universalism: She pursues water-quality accountability for community health beyond her immediate circle.
rationales.achievement: She builds actionable evidence and escalation options rather than stopping at frustration.
She keeps advancing three major workstreams despite overload and time pressure.
rationales.benevolence: She has not visited home for months and continues deferring close-family presence.

rationales.universalism: She refuses to shelve the water issue because broader harm would continue.
rationales.self_direction: She sets a clear fieldwork boundary despite guilt and external pressure.

rationales.achievement: She redesigns instructional materials overnight and confirms better student engagement.
rationales.universalism: She adapts content to reduce structural bias for students with different lived contexts.
rationales.hedonism: She knowingly trades sleep and recovery for continued output.

rationales.achievement: She documents measurable learning gains and receives district-level recognition.
rationales.universalism: She compiles data to challenge inequitable assessment assumptions at system level.

rationales.achievement: She prioritizes exam preparation duties and refuses leave during a critical school period.
rationales.benevolence: That decision deepens relational strain with her mother.
rationales.tradition: She misses Pongal participation despite its family-cultural significance.

rationales.achievement: She submits a strong portfolio and continues improving student metrics.
rationales.universalism: Her sustained advocacy helps trigger formal action on unsafe water.
rationales.benevolence: She acknowledges repeated missed family contact while work demands dominate.
